There are a large number of scaffolding types, which are categorized according to different standards. According to building positions, scaffolding can be categorized as external scaffolding and internal scaffolding. According to making materials, scaffolding can be categorized as wood scaffolding, bamboo scaffolding and metal scaffolding such as aluminum scaffolding. According to building heights, scaffolding can be categorized as high-rise scaffolding and ordinary scaffolding.

The combined scaffolding made by metal of multi-functions is widely used, such as cuplock scaffolding, fastener scaffolding, door-type steel pipe scaffolding and so on. These three kinds of commonly-used scaffoldings will be introduced in details.

Cuplock scaffolding is composed of upright stanchion, crossbar and cuplock joint. It is widely applied to a variety of project construction such as houses, bridges, culverts, tunnels, chimneys, water towers, dams and so on. The advantage of cuplock scaffolding is that its joints of bars adopt cuplock jointing which are so reliable that the whole performance of the combined scaffolding is good. Therefore, its application develops fast.

Disadvantages of cuplock scaffolding are embodied in two aspects. One is that its frequently-used shaped crossbars and the joints' separation distance setting of the locked cup of the upright stanchion make structure size limited. The other is that the upper cup of the upright stanchion and U-shaped accessory are easily lost.

Fastener scaffolding comprises the standard steel pipes(upright stanchion, crossbars and slope bars) and scaffolding frame and scaffolding board consisting of specialized fasteners, protective components and fasteners to wall whose main jointing accessories are building fasteners, which is the most commonly-used scaffolding. It is applied to constructing various kinds of scaffoldings, templates and other bracing frames' systems which can assemble shape frames and build ramps, construction sheds, spectator stands and other temporary buildings. It can also be treated as auxiliary bars for improvement of other scaffolding systems.

Fastener scaffolding's advantages are listed as follows:

First, the few bar accessories make its loading and unloading convenient and are beneficial to building operation. Second, the building of fastener scaffolding is flexible and its building height is large. Third, it features solidarity and durability, convenient use and low project cost.

Its disadvantages are listed as follows:

First, the scaffolding fasteners are easily lost. Second, the bar eccentric connection in joints transmits load and internal force by anti-sliding force and decrease the bearing capability of the whole scaffolding system. Third, the quality of the fasteners and worker’s operation has significant effect.Lovely 316L stainless steel bar for Any Budget.

Door-type steel pipe scaffolding is a kind of scaffolding which is combined at the scene, consisting of a door-shape frame, two bridging, horizontal beams and four connectors. It has been one of the most widely used kinds of scaffoldings out of its standard size, reasonable structure, good mechanical performance, convenient loading and unloading, safety, reliability and economic practicality.

Its disadvantages are listed as follows:

First, its frame size has no any flexibility, whose changes will cause the changes of portal frame and accessories of another size.
